Warranty VRS
Published 10/09/2014

VRS parts should be treated as any other Scania part, i.e. the common processes should be used. This means that Scania Warranty Manual 2014 is also applicable for VRS parts. • VRS-part mounted on Scania Chassis or Engine Use Normal Warranty routine for spare part • The Scania warranty system can only handle Scania Chassis and engine numbers today. This means that VRS-parts that are mounted on for instance Trailers and other Truck makes must be claimed as: Part from stock • Claims on SAF-Holland parts must be supported with additional information, see Warranty Manual E3.6.2
